quotes.quote: The one who loves you will make you weep.
When I fight with you, I'm really fighting for us..because If I didn't care, I wouldn't bother.
Life sucks when love hurts. Life hurts when love sucks. So just remember this much. Love will suck the life right out of you!
I love being married. It's so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
Love is a promise delivered already broken.
Deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
Love is deceitful and sublime. In its truest form, it brings out the best in all beings. At its worst, it's a tool used to manipulate and ruin anyone who is stupid enough to hold it.
I love you and it's getting worse.
Love is what makes two people sit in the middle of a bench when there is plenty of room at both ends.
Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
We just have to accept the fact that some people are going to stay in our hearts even if they don't stay in our lives.
Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
We all dream about love, want to be in love, and have been hurt by love.
So dear I love him, that with him all deaths I could endure, without him live no life.
People should fall in love with their eyes closed. Just close your eyes. Don't look and it's magic.
Love looks not with the eyes but with the mind. and therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
Worst feeling in the world is when someone you love the most like the person you hate.
Love is a grave mental disease.
Sometimes you're afraid to fall in love with a chick, but she sucks you in anyway.
Love sucks. Sometimes it feels good. Sometimes it's just another way to bleed.
My love life is like a piece of Swiss cheese. Most of it's missing, and what's there stinks.
You call it madness, but I call it love.
My love is expansive. Your love is expensive.
First love is a kind of vaccination which saves man from catching the complaint the second time.
If loving someone is putting them in a straitjacket and kicking them down a flight of stairs, then yes, I have loved a few people.
When one is in love, one always begins by deceiving one's self, and one always ends by deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
Love is an ocean of emotions entirely surrounded by expenses.
Love is unknown. To open the heart in trust is unknown. They say love hurts. It doesn't have to.
Love in action is a harsh and dreadful thing compared with love in dreams.
Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
